name: SCAPS AGENT (www.ScapsAgent.com)
blurb: Join the elite secret agency known as SCAPS.  Train to fight in 3D multiplayer battles and defeat the horrible Crah.

rewards.reward: CITIZEN: SCAPS Agent comic book #1 for starters - and maybe more!  This high quality comic is written by the legendary Marvel Comics author, Michael Lent.  This interactive version makes the comic totally explode to life on your computer   (downloadable PDF and playable App.) You also get an all access pass to the SCAPS Agent online game.

RECRUIT:  In addition to everything from the CITIZEN level you'll receive a downloadable - suitable for framing - SCAPS Agent Membership Package including: ID Card, Membership Certificate, SCAPS Agent Oath, Poster, Spider Code and SCAPS Agent 13 Vows Rule Book!

AGENT:  Get everything in the RECRUIT level, AND Downloadable: Trading Cards featuring the most popular SCAPS Agents and the evil Crah!  But that's not all!  You'll also receive SCAPS Agent Comic #2 AND We'll also give you immediate first viewing off all new levels in the SCAPS World!

AGENT BAUR:  All of the other premiums AND a PDF of the SCAPS Agent Secret Handbook, and Crah Hunter's Guidebook!  (We might make them interactive, but I'm not going to make promises!)  These books tell everything you need to know about training to be a SCAPS Agent and fighting the dreaded Crah!  It is a must for survival.

AGENT GREY: ALL of the other premiums in AGENT BAUER level AND a SCAPS Agent Limited Edition T-Shirt and SCAPS Agent tattoo!  NOT ENOUGH YOU SAY?  We'll even send you SIGNED hard copies of the membership package.  Please add $20 for shipping and handling.

AGENT ICE:  In addition to all the goodies in the AGENT GREY Level, you'll receive a signed copy of a first edition of Michael Lent's comic series, Brimstone.  In addition, we're adding on the SCAPS Agent Cut-Outs as well as an amount of Kronos (in-game virtual cash) to buy a very cool advanced weapon!  But wait!  You'll also get a downloadable catalog of all SCAPS and Crah  vending machine items including "Captain Grumps" and "Galactic Milk."

SHRINE:  All of the above goodies, and we will place a shrine in your honor in the game.  THAT'S RIGHT - A SHRINE!  We'll also throw in the very first Crah Advertisement and downloadable package for the Crah Muscle Program!

AGENT GHOST:  Yep, you get everything in every offer below, but this one will make you forever a SCAPS Agent.  We will take a picture of you (or anyone you like) and turn it into a 3D figure in the game.

THE ULTIMATE PACKAGE.  You guessed it.  Everything in every other offer and a signed original SCAPS Agent original piece of art signed  and with a certificate of authenticity.  We'll also throw in five more T-shirts for you and your friends, but these won't be any t-shirts - they are a limited run designed for the original artists and programmers.
